classes.cCustomNote: Any free elective can go here. BUS100 is recommended.

One course from each of the following GE areas must be completed: A1, A2, A3, B1, B2, Upper-Division B, C1, C2, Lower-Division C Elective, Upper-Division C, D1, D2, Upper-Division D, E, and GE Elective. Upper-Division B, Upper-Division C, and Upper-Division D should be taken only after junior standing is reached (90 units).

Students can attempt to fulfill the requirement after 90 earned units; students should complete the requirement before senior year. Any GWR class or GWR exam can go here. Refer to the current catalog for prerequisites.

Two Technology Management Major Requirements that can double count for Upper-Division B (ITP330 and ITP341). Double counting will cause an increase in the number of free elective units. See catalog for course options.
